summary.span: Wraps ActiveX controls and exposes them as fully featured Windows Forms controls.

span.span: Wraps ActiveX controls and exposes them as fully featured Windows Forms controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不會使用直接類別。You typically do not use the class directly. 您可以使用[Aximp.exe （Windows Form ActiveX 控制項匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/aximp-exe-windows-forms-activex-control-importer.md)來產生包裝函式，擴充。You can use the [Aximp.exe (Windows Forms ActiveX Control Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/aximp-exe-windows-forms-activex-control-importer.md) to generate the wrappers that extend . ActiveX 控制項匯入工具會產生的類別，衍生自類別，並將其編譯為程式庫檔案 (DLL) 可新增為您的應用程式的參考。The ActiveX Control Importer generates a class that is derived from the class, and compiles it into a library file (DLL) that can be added as a reference to your application. 或者，您可以使用`/source`切換使用 ActiveX 控制項匯入工具，並會產生的 C# 檔案您衍生的類別。Alternatively, you can use the `/source` switch with the ActiveX Control Importer and a C# file is generated for your derived class. 您可以變更的程式碼並重新編譯為程式庫檔案。You can then make changes to the code and recompile it into a library file. > [!NOTE] > 如果 ActiveX 控制項的成員名稱符合.NET Framework 中，已定義的名稱，則 ActiveX 控制項匯入工具會在成員名稱前面加"Ctl"會在建立時衍生的類別。If the name of a member of the ActiveX control matches a name defined in the .NET Framework, then the ActiveX Control Importer will prefix the member name with "Ctl" when it creates the derived class. 例如，如果您的 ActiveX 控制項名為"Layout"的成員，它會重新命名"CtlLayout"中的衍生類別，因為`Layout`.NET Framework 中定義事件。For example, if your ActiveX control has a member named "Layout", it is renamed "CtlLayout" in the derived class because the `Layout` event is defined within the .NET Framework. 大部分的通用屬性類別才有效，且使用如果基礎 ActiveX 控制項公開這些屬性。Most of the common properties of the class are only valid and used if the underlying ActiveX control exposes those properties. 通用屬性的一些範例包含， ， ，和。A few examples of the common properties are , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Visual Studio 為您的 Windows Form 設計環境，您可以對 ActiveX 控制項可以使用您的應用程式將 ActiveX 控制項加入至您的工具箱。If you are using Visual Studio as your Windows Forms design environment, you can make an ActiveX control available to your application by adding the ActiveX control to your Toolbox. 若要完成此動作，以滑鼠右鍵按一下**工具箱**，選取**自訂工具箱**，然後瀏覽至 ActiveX control's.ocx 檔案。To accomplish this, right-click the **Toolbox**, select **Customize Toolbox**, then browse to the ActiveX control's.ocx file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Visual Studio 文件中的 「 加入 ActiveX 控制項至 Windows 表單 」。For more information, see "Adding ActiveX Controls to Windows Forms" in the Visual Studio documentation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會覆寫建構函式，而和方法衍生包裝 Microsoft 格式編輯 ActiveX 控制項的類別。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此程式碼需要您已建立產生的原始程式碼 MSMask32.ocx 檔案上執行 AxImp.exe`/source`參數來產生包裝函式類別，可供編輯。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 這會顯示程式碼只能在 C# 語法因為這是唯一的語言輸出 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的二進位表示法`flags`參數值包含由 0x1 值的位元，將不會包含控制項的捷徑功能表**編輯**選項 ActiveX 控制項未明確提供它。If the binary representation of the `flags` parameter value contains the bit represented by the value 0x1, the shortcut menu for the control will not contain an **Edit** option unless the ActiveX control explicitly provides it. 如果的二進位表示法`flags`參數值包含由 0x2 值的位元，控制項的捷徑功能表會包含屬性選項，如果 ActiveX 控制項提供一組屬性頁面中; 否則快顯功能表將包含屬性選項，只有當 ActiveX 控制項明確地提供。If the binary representation of the `flags` parameter value contains the bit represented by the value 0x2, the shortcut menu for the control will contain a Properties option if the ActiveX control offers a set of property pages; otherwise, the shortcut menu will contain a Properties option only if the ActiveX control explicitly provides it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OLE Automation 日期會實作為其值是從午夜 30 1899 年的日數的浮點數。An OLE Automation date is implemented as a floating-point number whose value is the number of days from midnight, 30 December 1899. 例如，午夜 31 1899 年所表示 1.0;上午 6 點 2.25; 表示 1 年 1 月 1900午夜-1.0; 表示 29 1899 年而且早上 6 點-1.25 表示 29 1899 年。For example, midnight, 31 December 1899 is represented by 1.0; 6 A.M., 1 January 1900 is represented by 2.25; midnight, 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.0; and 6 A.M., 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.25. 基底 OLE Automation 日期為午夜，30 1899 年。The base OLE Automation Date is midnight, 30 December 1899. 最大 OLE Automation 日期等同於、 31 年 12 月的最後一刻 9999。The maximum OLE Automation Date is the same as , the last moment of 31 December 9999. 如需 OLE Automation 的詳細資訊，請參閱[MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: The value of this instance cannot be represented as an OLE Automation Date.

span.span: The value of this instance cannot be represented as an OLE Automation Date.

span.span: A that represents the same date and time as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `date`參數是代表日期做為基底日期前後，午夜，30 1899 年的日數的雙精確度浮點數。The `date` parameter is a double-precision floating-point number that represents a date as the number of days before or after the base date, midnight, 30 December 1899. 符號和整數類資料類型屬於`date`編碼日期做為正或負一天加上的位移，從 1899 年 30，以及小數部分的絕對值`date`編碼為一天加上位移，從午夜一部分的一天時間。The sign and integral part of `date` encode the date as a positive or negative day displacement from 30 December 1899, and the absolute value of the fractional part of `date` encodes the time of day as a fraction of a day displacement from midnight. `date` 必須是正數 2958466.0 透過負數 657435.0 之間的值。`date` must be a value between negative 657435.0 through positive 2958466.0. 請注意，由於日期編碼的方式，有兩種代表 30 1899 年當天任何時間。Note that because of the way dates are encoded, there are two ways of representing any time of day on 30 December 1899. 例如，-0.5，0.5 表示中午 30 1899 年，因為日期加上位移的加號或減號基底日期則從零天仍然是基底的日期，而且從午夜的半天位移中午。For example, -0.5 and 0.5 both mean noon on 30 December 1899 because a day displacement of plus or minus zero days from the base date is still the base date, and a half day displacement from midnight is noon. 如需 OLE Automation 的詳細資訊，請參閱[MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: The date is not a valid OLE Automation Date value.

span.span: The date is not a valid OLE Automation Date value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法也允許衍生的類別處理方法，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the method without attaching a delegate. 這是處理的慣用的技巧方法在衍生類別中的。This is the preferred technique for handling the method in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會覆寫建構函式，而和方法衍生包裝 Microsoft 格式編輯 ActiveX 控制項的類別。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此程式碼需要您已建立產生的原始程式碼 MSMask32.ocx 檔案上執行 AxImp.exe`/source`參數來產生包裝函式類別，可供編輯。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 這會顯示程式碼只能在 C# 語法因為這是唯一的語言輸出 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the method.
